channel.title: Cant Put Server Online! Help 317 Private Server
channel.description:
I cant put the server online. I have the Client folder which has a Client file. As well as a Server Folder that ALSO HAS A CLIENT FILE, WHICH IS DIFFERENT. The server folder has a ini file named server which is needed to change the port. I set the port to 43594 but it says "error connecting to server" [u]When I put 6112, it runs like a charm,[/u] but I can't see people. Why does it NOT work on 43594? I have another computer in my house and it does not connect to my server. Why?
WHAT I HAVE DONE ------> [u]changed the ip[/u] to default IP "which was 127.0.0.1 to my no Ip" on Client-Folder-Client and Server-Folder-Client, [u]I've changed the Server Ini File to 43594 and 6112.[/u]
P.S. Either which way of changing the client Ip's on Port 6112 the client still runs and logins in except i cant see people. But when I change it to 43594, it says "error connecting to server' and my other PC does not connect.
Please tell me the Correct configurations to get my server online cause it only logs into the game with Port 6112.
[u]I have port forwarded the Both Ip's when I tried, and added both as exceptions to my firewall.[/u]

item.title: Cant Put Server Online! Help 317 Private Server
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

strucker:

what about server.ini?

Read full topic

item.title: Cant Put Server Online! Help 317 Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Fly4Fantasy Fly4Fantasy
item.description:
@Fly4Fantasy wrote:

The only program I have is No-Ip,

I’ve portforwarded

Name: RSPS1

Range: From: 43594 To: 43594

Protocol: Both UDP and TCP

Read full topic

item.title: Cant Put Server Online! Help 317 Private Server
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

[quote=“Fly4Fantasy, post:5, topic:462949”]Plz Help but if you could that would be good. Maybe Youtube video tutorial, or some tutorial here.

But I’ve edited server.java already… to 6612, and 43594, and i’ve port-forwarded both, but with 43594 it doesn’t login into the game, and with 6612 it wont share it, but it allows me to login to the game.[/quote]

Hmm… maybe you have like a program running such as utorrent which is already using the port!

Read full topic
item.source: Cant Put Server Online! Help 317 Private Server

item.title: Cant Put Server Online! Help 317 Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

i’ve heard of this many times, the problem is quite simple tbh. ill list it in steps.

  1. Right click
  2. Delete
  3. Go to trash bin
  4. Empty Trash bin
  5. Problem Solved

Hope this helped!!

Read full topic

item.title: Cant Put Server Online! Help 317 Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Fly4Fantasy Fly4Fantasy
item.description:
@Fly4Fantasy wrote:

I cant put the server online. I have the Client folder which has a Client file. As well as a Server Folder that ALSO HAS A CLIENT FILE, WHICH IS DIFFERENT. The server folder has a ini file named server which is needed to change the port. I set the port to 43594 but it says “error connecting to server” When I put 6112, it runs like a charm, but I can’t see people. Why does it NOT work on 43594? I have another computer in my house and it does not connect to my server. Why?

WHAT I HAVE DONE ------> changed the ip to default IP “which was 127.0.0.1 to my no Ip” on Client-Folder-Client and Server-Folder-Client, I’ve changed the Server Ini File to 43594 and 6112.

P.S. Either which way of changing the client Ip’s on Port 6112 the client still runs and logins in except i cant see people. But when I change it to 43594, it says "error connecting to server’ and my other PC does not connect.

Please tell me the Correct configurations to get my server online cause it only logs into the game with Port 6112.

I have port forwarded the Both Ip’s when I tried, and added both as exceptions to my firewall.
